events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund since it doesn't fit as expected and feels too tight around the shoulders.
The issue has been categorized under Refund as the customer requests a return and money back for a purchased item that does not fit properly.
Your refund request has been forwarded to our Returns Specialist who will assist you further with the process.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. I understand you'd like to get a refund for the jacket you purchased. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed? This will help us process your refund smoothly.

That sounds perfect, thank you! I'll print the label and send the jacket back tomorrow.
We have received your returned jacket in good condition and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Thank you for contacting support. We are closing this case now, but feel free to reach out if you have further questions or need assistance.
